mapper.select: select count(1) from mip_spreadtrum s,mip_organization g where s.org_id = g.id and s.status = 1

select count(1) from mip_virtual_exibition_hall s left join mip_organization g on s.org_id = g.id left join bj_museum_base_info b on b.museum_id = g.id left join mip_area ma on ma.id = b.area where 1=1 and s.status = 1 and b.del_flag = 2 order by publish_time desc
